attributes.action: Ban the Sunday Sport's Dwarf Tossing Eevent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Sunday Sport newspaper has launched a national search for over 100 dwarves in order to hold the largest dwarf tossing event ever held. 

Dwarfs, midgets and little people are being recruited to appear at the secret location at the end of the month to resurrect the sport of Dwarf Tossing.  The event is being run by the Sunday Sport following a request from Phil the Dynamo dwarf (the newspaper’s resident dwarf photographer) after he heard that the experience was exhilarating.  

This sport has been banned in various states across America, France and Canada and i feel that it should be banned in the UK as well!  

This kind of "sport" is degrading, vile and insulting and should be banned!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
